info.name: Mixillo API - Complete Collection
info.description:
Complete Postman collection for Mixillo TikTok-style social commerce platform.

## Features
- 98+ API endpoints organized by domain
- Environment variables for easy switching (production/local)
- Pre-request scripts for automatic authentication
- Test scripts for response validation
- Example requests with realistic data

## Quick Start
1. Import this collection into Postman
2. Import the environment (Mixillo - Production or Mixillo - Local)
3. Run "Authentication > Register" to create a test user
4. Run "Authentication > Login" - tokens will be saved automatically
5. Explore other endpoints with authentication already configured

## Authentication
All authenticated endpoints automatically use {{ACCESS_TOKEN}} variable.
Tokens are automatically refreshed using pre-request scripts.

## Environments
- **Mixillo - Production**: https://mixillo-backend-52242135857.europe-west1.run.app
- **Mixillo - Local**: http://localhost:5000
